---
title: `r paste0("How many streets and squares are dedicated to women in ", params$city, "?")`
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library("genderedstreetnames")
```



```{r}
Download_OSM(countries = params$country)

roads <- Extract_roads(countries = params$country)

city_boundary <- Get_city_boundaries(city = params$city, country = params$country, cache = TRUE)

city_roads <- Subset_roads(boundary = city_boundary, roads = roads)
#> although coordinates are longitude/latitude, st_within assumes that they are planar

tmap::tm_shape(city_boundary) + 
  tmap::tm_polygons() +
  tmap::tm_shape(city_roads) +
  tmap::tm_lines()
```
